title: Interactive Web-Based Mathematics Project: Data Analysis and Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: High school mathematics foundation (Math I, II level)
context.additional_context: Learners access web-based platforms via personal devices and perform math projects using real-time collaboration tools and asynchronous discussion boards

learning_goals: Learners can build regression analysis models using real datasets and perform statistical interpretations
Learners implement at least three feedback loops with peers using web-based collaboration tools to refine problem-solving strategies
Learners create interactive web content (e.g., Desmos/GeoGebra) that visually represents mathematical discoveries
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
